title: Competition (Top 40 under 40)
description: How do we get bright entrepreneurs to submit innovative proposals to the Catalyst program.
solution: Very Easy... We will Orachstrate a competition where we will screen for top 40 business ideas under the age of 40 and live stream.
experience:
